Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The social media-savvy have been vocal on various topics from trashing the Reserve Bank of Australia to sharing their thoughts on the upcoming Federal Budget. Bob Katter's youthful anecdotes amused viewers in an interview. Worries over the ACT budget allocation for abortions were expressed while a tax team shared a webcast to prepare businesses for the budget. With predictions on who may be targeted in the budget and a conversation that confirmed a decision would not be implemented many are eagerly waiting for the release of the Federal Budget.
